column1: Kasrawad is a subdistrict (tehsil) and nagar panchayat in Khargone district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh.

Kasrawad is located at 22.13°N 75.6°E﻿ / 22.13; 75.6. It has an average elevation of 169 metres (554 feet) and is 17 km in east from National Highway 3 (Agra to Mumbai) and about 100 km from Indore.The town is 5 km from the northern banks of the holy Narmada River.
